org.deidentifier.arx.masking

Class AbstractInstanceMasker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.AbstractInstanceMasker<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data to be masked.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInstanceMasker<T>

    public abstract class AbstractInstanceMasker<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInstanceMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on single instances of data of type T. The implementation for the masking must be provided in the IInstanceMasker.mask(T) method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractInstanceMasker() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String maskString(java.lang.String input, IDataParser<T> parser)
      Interprets the input string as a data instance of type T, performs data masking on it and returns the masked data, converted back to a string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface org.deidentifier.arx.masking.IInstanceMasker

        mask

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractInstanceMasker

        public AbstractInstanceMasker()

    • Method Detail

      • maskString

        public java.lang.String maskString(java.lang.String input,
                          IDataParser<T> parser)
        Interprets the input string as a data instance of type T, performs data masking on it and returns the masked data, converted back to a string.
        Parameters:
        input - The string representing a data instance.
        parser - The parser used to interpret the string as data - usually a DataType.
        Returns:
        The string representing the masked data.
